verses.text: \w Go|strong="H4994"\w* \w about|strong="H3045"\w* \w through|strong="H7751"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w streets|strong="H2351"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w consider|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w in|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* broad places thereof, \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w you|strong="H0518"\w* \w can|strong="H0518"\w* fins \w a|strong="H7200"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* executeth judgement, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* seeketh \w faith|strong="H0530"\w*: \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* merciful unto \w it|strong="H0518"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w though|strong="H0518"\w* \w they|strong="H0518"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* liveth; \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* \w falsely|strong="H8267"\w*.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, thy \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* upon \w truth|strong="H0530"\w*: thou hast \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* grieved: thou hast bruised \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w refused|strong="H3985"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* \w correction|strong="H4148"\w*: \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w made|strong="H2388"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* \w harder|strong="H2388"\w* \w than|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w rock|strong="H5553"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w refused|strong="H3985"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Perhaps|strong="H3588"\w* \w these|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w poor|strong="H1800"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w foolish|strong="H2973"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H0559"\w* judgement \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* go \w therefore|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w men|strong="H1419"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* judgement \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* behold \w these|strong="H1992"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w* \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w* \w more|strong="H1419"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w burst|strong="H5423"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w bonds|strong="H4147"\w*.

Wherefore \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w lion|strong="H0738"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wood hath \w slain|strong="H5221"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w wolf|strong="H2061"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* evening, hath spoiled \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w leopard|strong="H5246"\w* watcheth \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*: \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* shall \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* thence shall \w be|strong="H3605"\w* \w taken|strong="H5221"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w* \w are|strong="H6588"\w* \w multiplied|strong="H7231"\w*, \w their|strong="H3605"\w* rebellions \w are|strong="H6588"\w* strengthened.

How \w can|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* merciful \w to|strong="H0430"\w* thee? thy \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* forsaken \w me|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* \w by|strong="H7650"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*: \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w fed|strong="H7646"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w full|strong="H7646"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w committed|strong="H5003"\w* \w adultery|strong="H5003"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* rioted \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w harlot’s|strong="H2181"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w They|strong="H0376"\w* \w are|strong="H0376"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* amorous \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w stallions|strong="H5483"\w*, \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* neighed \w after|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w neighbor’s|strong="H7453"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*.

\w Shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w*, sayeth \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*? \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w take|strong="H5358"\w* \w revenge|strong="H5358"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w such|strong="H2088"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*?

Scale \w down|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* walls thereof, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* throw \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w down|strong="H3588"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* utterly \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w*: \w take|strong="H5493"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w branches|strong="H5189"\w* thereof, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord’s|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Juda \w have|strong="H3068"\w* greatly transgressed against \w me|strong="H1004"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w denied|strong="H3584"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w It|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*: \w we|strong="H7200"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3541"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* spoken \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*, \w and|strong="H5030"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w was|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* word \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w God|strong="H0369"\w* \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w*: these \w things|strong="H1961"\w* \w therefore|strong="H3541"\w* \w shall|strong="H5030"\w* \w befall|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*: \w Because|strong="H3282"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w*, \w behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H8085"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w afar|strong="H4801"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w a|strong="H8085"\w* strong \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*, \w an|strong="H0935"\w* \w ancient|strong="H5769"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*, \w a|strong="H8085"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* \w whose|strong="H1471"\w* \w language|strong="H3956"\w* thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w understand|strong="H3045"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w say|strong="H1696"\w*.

\w Their|strong="H3605"\w* \w quiver|strong="H0827"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* as an \w open|strong="H6605"\w* sepulchre, \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H1368"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w valiant|strong="H1368"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w up|strong="H0398"\w* thy corn, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*: \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*: \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w up|strong="H0398"\w* thy \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w herds|strong="H1241"\w*: \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* thy vineyards, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w figs|strong="H8384"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w with|strong="H3899"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w destroy|strong="H2719"\w* thy strong \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, \w wherein|strong="H0834"\w* thou trustest.

\w Nevertheless|strong="H1571"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w those|strong="H1992"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* bring \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* utter \w destruction|strong="H3617"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w why|strong="H4100"\w* hath \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w*? thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w As|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* forsaken \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w served|strong="H5647"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w strange|strong="H2114"\w* \w god|strong="H0430"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w strangers|strong="H2114"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w Declare|strong="H5046"\w* ye \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* publish \w it|strong="H1004"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* Juda, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w O|strong="H4994"\w* \w foolish|strong="H5530"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w understanding|strong="H3820"\w*: \w who|strong="H0369"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*: \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w ears|strong="H0241"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w Will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w then|strong="H0853"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* repent \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*? \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sand|strong="H2344"\w* \w a|strong="H7760"\w* bound \w for|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w an|strong="H7760"\w* \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w ordinance|strong="H2706"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H6440"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w waves|strong="H1530"\w* thereof \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w toss|strong="H1607"\w* \w themselves|strong="H7760"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w prevail|strong="H3201"\w*: \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* swell, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H6440"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* hard \w of|strong="H3820"\w* belief \w and|strong="H2088"\w* provoking, \w they|strong="H5971"\w* \w are|strong="H3820"\w* revolted \w and|strong="H2088"\w* \w gone|strong="H5493"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*: \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* giveth \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w early|strong="H3138"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w latter|strong="H4456"\w* \w rain|strong="H1653"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w due|strong="H2708"\w* \w season|strong="H6256"\w*: \w who|strong="H3068"\w* preserveth \w for|strong="H6256"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* fullness \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* yearly \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w*.

\w Your|strong="H5186"\w* \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w* \w have|strong="H5771"\w* \w turned|strong="H5186"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w* \w away|strong="H5186"\w*, \w and|strong="H5771"\w* \w your|strong="H5186"\w* \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* \w have|strong="H5771"\w* withholden \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w you|strong="H4480"\w*.
